andromeda.why: Root pressure to begin is self-calibration, not a rescue axis.

arcturus.why: Frames the kickoff—scope, sequence, and cadence for a safe start.

draco.why: Early ‘go-time’ anxiety can flip into start-policing or rank optics.

lyra.why: Naming the kickoff clarifies the story of the cycle.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing rules to force a start rather than aligning readiness.

orion-light.why: Small honorable ordeal: commit cleanly to the first step.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing and support regulate nerves at ignition.

sirius.why: Internal start hygiene; no transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Chooses which cycle to begin without surrendering agency.

arcturus.why: Places the start—right time, budget, and capacity window.

draco.why: Threshold guard against opportunists and scope-creep.

lyra.why: Crisp phrasing creates a receivable start signal.

orion-dark.why: Conforming to hustle doctrine over truth of timing.

orion-light.why: Courage to commit to a modest, clean kickoff.

pleiades.why: Attuned support steadies nerves at the threshold.

sirius.why: Skilled placement, not yet formal instruction.

andromeda.why: Novelty-seeking outsources agency to ‘the next start.’

draco.why: Clique gating and status tests around who ‘gets to start.’

orion-dark.why: Dogma of ‘always be starting’ forces compliance.

orion-light.why: Lesson: reduce scope, re-time, and align intent.

pleiades.why: Appeasement to keep momentum breeds enmeshment.

andromeda.why: Frees energy by limiting to viable cycle starts.

arcturus.why: Designs start protocol—sequence, capacity gates, and review.

draco.why: Fair thresholds protect from predatory or showy launches.

lyra.why: A clear initiating image guides the run-up.

orion-dark.why: Process can ossify into ritualized ‘proper start.’

pleiades.why: Supportive hosting keeps the team regulated at ignition.

sirius.why: Teaches kickoff protocol by example—how to begin without harm.

andromeda.why: Uses influence to end coercive ‘go’ culture; starts that preserve freedom.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for beginnings—criteria, pacing, and safeguards.

draco.why: Enforces fair thresholds and loyalty to the maturation path.

lyra.why: Turns the kickoff into a coherent cultural phrase/model.

orion-dark.why: Orthodoxy risk—canonizing ‘the right way to start.’

orion-light.why: Integrity to initiate or delay under pressure to prove.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth supports adoption without enmeshment.

andromeda.why: Embodied freedom to begin or refrain—choice beyond start-pressure.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring canon for initiating cycles responsibly.

draco.why: Presence can read as gate to ‘real’ starts.

lyra.why: Archetypal simplicity—few words ignite aligned cycles.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to trigger or decline kickoff by integrity.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: beginnings canon transmitted by presence/protocol.
